title: 地图
content:
方位短语

基本方位

  • At the front of

    • 用法：表示在某物的前面或前方。
    • 例子：“The entrance is at the front of the building.”（入口在建筑的前面。）

  • At the back of

    • 用法：表示在某物的后面或背面。
    • 例子：“The storage room is at the back of the office.”（储藏室在办公室的后面。）

  • On the left of

    • 用法：表示在某物的左侧。
    • 例子：“The kitchen is on the left of the living room.”（厨房在客厅的左侧。）

  • On the right of

    • 用法：表示在某物的右侧。
    • 例子：“The bathroom is on the right of the hallway.”（卫生间在走廊的右侧。）

  • To the north of

    • 用法：表示在某物的北面。
    • 例子：“The park is to the north of the library.”（公园在图书馆的北面。）

  • To the south of

    • 用法：表示在某物的南面。
    • 例子：“The school is to the south of the hospital.”（学校在医院的南面。）

  • To the east of

    • 用法：表示在某物的东面。
    • 例子：“The café is to the east of the bank.”（咖啡馆在银行的东面。）

  • To the west of

    • 用法：表示在某物的西面。
    • 例子：“The supermarket is to the west of the park.”（超市在公园的西面。）

  • In the center of

    • 用法：表示在某物的中央。
    • 例子：“The fountain is in the center of the square.”（喷泉在广场的中央。）

  • In the corner of

    • 用法：表示在某物的角落。
    • 例子：“The bookshelf is in the corner of the room.”（书架在房间的角落。）

  • At the top of

    • 用法：表示在某物的顶部。
    • 例子：“The title is at the top of the page.”（标题在页面的顶部。）

  • At the bottom of

    • 用法：表示在某物的底部。
    • 例子：“The footer is at the bottom of the document.”（页脚在文档的底部。）

  • On the opposite side of

    • 用法：表示在某物的对面。
    • 例子：“The gym is on the opposite side of the street.”（健身房在街道的对面。）

  • Next to

    • 用法：表示在某物的旁边或紧靠。
    • 例子：“The restaurant is next to the bookstore.”（餐馆在书店旁边。）

  • Adjacent to

    • 用法：表示在某物的邻近或接近。
    • 例子：“The parking lot is adjacent to the office building.”（停车场在办公楼旁边。）

  • Across from

    • 用法：表示在某物的对面。
    • 例子：“The post office is across from the library.”（邮局在图书馆的对面。）

  • Behind

    • 用法：表示在某物的后面。
    • 例子：“The garden is behind the house.”（花园在房子的后面。）

  • In front of

    • 用法：表示在某物的前面。
    • 例子：“The car is parked in front of the garage.”（车停在车库的前面。）

  • Alongside

    • 用法：表示在某物的旁边或沿着。
    • 例子：“The benches are placed alongside the path.”（长椅放在小径旁边。）

其他方位短语

  • In the middle of

    • 用法：表示在某物的中间部分。
    • 例子：“The fountain is in the middle of the park.”（喷泉在公园的中间。）

  • At the edge of

    • 用法：表示在某物的边缘。
    • 例子：“The restaurant is at the edge of the village.”（餐馆在村庄的边缘。）

  • On the outskirts of

    • 用法：表示在某物的外围或边缘。
    • 例子：“The new shopping mall is on the outskirts of the city.”（新的购物中心在城市的边缘。）

  • In close proximity to

    • 用法：表示在某物的附近。
    • 例子：“The hospital is in close proximity to the school.”（医院在学校附近。）

  • At the rear of

    • 用法：表示在某物的后面。
    • 例子：“The garden is at the rear of the house.”（花园在房子的后面。）

  • In the vicinity of

    • 用法：表示在某物的周围地区。
    • 例子：“There are several restaurants in the vicinity of the theater.”（剧院附近有几家餐馆。）

  • On the corner of

    • 用法：表示在某物的拐角处。
    • 例子：“The bank is on the corner of Main Street and Elm Street.”（银行在主街和榆树街的拐角处。）

  • In the area around

    • 用法：表示在某物的周围区域。
    • 例子：“There are several shops in the area around the square.”（广场周围有几家商店。）

  • To the left of

    • 用法：表示在某物的左侧。
    • 例子：“The post office is to the left of the café.”（邮局在咖啡馆的左侧。）

  • To the right of

    • 用法：表示在某物的右侧。
    • 例子：“The library is to the right of the park.”（图书馆在公园的右侧。）

  • In the direction of

    • 用法：表示朝某个方向。
    • 例子：“The hotel is in the direction of the airport.”（酒店朝向机场的方向。）

  • At the junction of

    • 用法：表示在两条路或两个区域的交汇处。
    • 例子：“The traffic lights are at the junction of River Road and Oak Avenue.”（红绿灯在河道路和橡树大道的交汇处。）

  • In the heart of

    • 用法：表示在某物的中心地带。
    • 例子：“The museum is located in the heart of the city.”（博物馆位于城市的中心地带。）

  • On the far side of

    • 用法：表示在某物的远侧。
    • 例子：“The playground is on the far side of the park.”（游乐场在公园的远侧。）

  • Close to

    • 用法：表示接近某物。
    • 例子：“The supermarket is close to the residential area.”（超市靠近住宅区。）

  • Adjacent to

    • 用法：表示紧邻或相邻。
    • 例子：“The conference room is adjacent to the main office.”（会议室紧邻主办公室。）

  • In the neighborhood of

    • 用法：表示在某物的邻近区域。
    • 例子：“There are several attractions in the neighborhood of the hotel.”（酒店附近有几个景点。）

  • In the vicinity of

    • 用法：表示在某物的周围。
    • 例子：“There are several schools in the vicinity of the university.”（大学周围有几所学校。）

1. 位置描述

  • The [object/place] is located [preposition] the [reference point].

    • 例子：“The library is located next to the park.”

  • You can find the [object/place] [preposition] the [reference point].

    • 例子：“You can find the supermarket across from the bank.”

  • The [object/place] is situated [preposition] the [reference point].

    • 例子：“The restaurant is situated at the corner of Maple Street and Oak Avenue.”

2. 方位关系

  • [Object/Place] is [preposition] [reference point].

    • 例子：“The school is behind the hospital.”

  • [Object/Place] is [preposition] [reference point] of [object/place].

    • 例子：“The café is to the north of the library.”

  • The [object/place] is [preposition] [object/place].

    • 例子：“The gym is adjacent to the swimming pool.”

3. 描述距离

  • The [object/place] is [distance] [preposition] the [reference point].

    • 例子：“The post office is 200 meters from the school.”

  • [Object/Place] is [distance] [preposition] [reference point].

    • 例子：“The bus stop is just a short walk from the café.”

4. 方位变化

  • [Object/Place] has been moved [preposition] the [reference point].

    • 例子：“The playground has been moved to the east of the park.”

  • The [object/place] has changed its position [preposition] the [reference point].

    • 例子：“The new building has changed its position relative to the old library.”

5. 描述方向

  • The [object/place] is facing [direction].

    • 例子：“The office building is facing the river.”

  • [Object/Place] faces [direction] [preposition] [reference point].

    • 例子：“The theater faces south of the town square.”

6. 描述相对位置

  • The [object/place] is [preposition] [object/place] [preposition] [object/place].

    • 例子：“The café is between the bookstore and the bakery.”

  • The [object/place] is [preposition] the [object/place] [preposition] [object/place].

    • 例子：“The bank is across from the supermarket, next to the library.”

7. 特定位置

  • At the [specific location].

    • 例子：“Meet me at the entrance of the park.”

  • On the [specific location].

    • 例子：“The restaurant is on the second floor of the mall.”

  • In the [specific location].

    • 例子：“The office is in the west wing of the building.”

8. 描述相对方位

  • [Object/Place] is [preposition] the [reference point], [preposition] the [another reference point].

    • 例子：“The cinema is near the supermarket, opposite the bank.”

  • [Object/Place] is [preposition] the [reference point] [relative position].

    • 例子：“The park is to the right of the museum.”

9. 描述新增区域

  • The [new feature] has been added [preposition] the [previous feature].

    • 例子：“The playground has been added next to the existing sports field.”

  • A new [object/feature] now occupies the space [preposition] the former [object/feature].

    • 例子：“A new café now occupies the space where the old bookstore used to be.”

10. 描述减少区域

  • The area previously occupied by [object/feature] has been reduced [preposition] [new feature].

    • 例子：“The area previously occupied by the parking lot has been reduced to make space for a new garden.”

  • The [object/feature] has been removed [preposition] [location] to create room for [new feature].

    • 例子：“The old shed has been removed from the backyard to create room for a new patio.”

11. 描述变化方向

  • The [object/feature] has expanded [preposition] its original location.

    • 例子：“The shopping mall has expanded beyond its original location to include more retail spaces.”

  • The [object/feature] has contracted [preposition] its initial size.

    • 例子：“The conference room has contracted from its initial size to make room for additional offices.”

12. 描述位置变动

  • The [object/feature] has shifted [preposition] [direction] of the [reference point].

    • 例子：“The library has shifted to the west of its previous location.”

  • The [object/feature] has been relocated [preposition] [new position].

    • 例子：“The information desk has been relocated to the front entrance of the building.”

13. 描述空间重组

  • The layout of [object/feature] has been reorganized [preposition] [new configuration].

    • 例子：“The layout of the exhibition hall has been reorganized into different sections for better flow.”

  • [Object/feature] has been redesigned to [new configuration], affecting the overall space.

    • 例子：“The park has been redesigned to include more playgrounds and walking paths, affecting the overall layout.”

14. 描述减少或增加区域

  • The area for [object/feature] has been decreased/increased [preposition] [amount].

    • 例子：“The area for parking has been decreased by half to make space for a new building.”

  • The [object/feature] now covers a larger/smaller area [preposition] its previous size.

    • 例子：“The new gym now covers a larger area than the previous one.”

15. 描述空间调整

  • The space originally designated for [object/feature] has been converted into [new use].

    • 例子：“The space originally designated for a storage room has been converted into a meeting area.”

  • The [object/feature] has been expanded/reduced in size, affecting its surrounding area.

    • 例子：“The cafeteria has been expanded in size, affecting the layout of the surrounding rooms.”
